article.author: American Queen™ Steamboat Company
article.title: Come Home to the Heart of America
article.lead: Come celebrate America. All of America. From the storied currents of the Mississippi to the vast horizons of the Pacific Northwest, her vistas never fail to inspire. From the quaint river towns of along the Ohio to the majestic wilderness that surrounds the Columbia and Snake, her natural beauty is astounding. From the gentle breezes cruising on the Tennessee to the sparkling blue of Gulf in New Orleans, her waters are warm with welcome. And within easy reach of your own backyard there’s a graceful paddlewheeler waiting to take you there.

article.author: Travel Impressions
article.title: Destination: Anywhere
article.lead: You're ready. Ready to dream now of travel tomorrow. Ready for sunshine and better days ahead. So, Travel Impressions is getting set for it. Get SET with Travel Impressions.
